short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Select a canadapost tracking number, right click and track.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is not an official extension from CanadaPost. This is a simple extension that makes it faster to track your online orders. You simply select your CanadaPost tracking number, right click and click on Track CanadaPost item.
